property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: You gain 2 life. −1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. −6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence." - Zaliki of Naya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." - Jazal Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures. Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With skill and strength honed upon the prairie, Naxtil won his battles high above it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fine soldiers guarded the northern front. They waited for two-legged foes and left the skies unheeded." - General Avitora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say only the good die young. Obviously, you are one of the exceptions." - Delrobah, cleric of Ivora Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each crusader bonds with a griffin fledgling while still a child, and the two grow up as siblings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." - Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves." - Torian Sha, soul warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Little moth, fluttering bright, What luck will you bring tonight?" - Benalish children's rhyme

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness." - Codex of the Constellari

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!" - General Avitora

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." - Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Roc Egg dies, create a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfect justice in service of a perfect will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!" - General Avitora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins." - Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A relic donation is suggested." "The suggestion is mandatory." - Temple signs

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come." - Stormfront fable

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If they succeed in their holy work, their order will vanish into welcome obscurity, for there will be no more souls to redeem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Vengeful Archon deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep - one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some mages do their best work in solitude. Others do their best work creating it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ground polluted floats with human gore, And human carnage taints the dreadful shore Fly swift the dangerous coast: let every ear Be stopp'd against the song! 'tis death to hear!" - Homer, The Odyssey, trans. Pope

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More so than "storm" or "pirate," "drake" is the word a sailor least wants to hear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to say which is more satisfying: the search for that missing piece or fitting that piece into place." - Evo Ragus

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas." - Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Conundrum Sphinx attacks, each player chooses a card name. Then each player reveals the top card of their library. If the card a player revealed has the name they chose, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, that player puts it on the bottom of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘That was a narrow escape!' said Alice, a good deal frightened at the sudden change, but very glad to find herself still in existence." - Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood." - Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two eyes to see what could be, two eyes to see what will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −1[0]: Target player mills twenty cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player mill a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You may cast spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once common in the Kapsho Seas, merfolk were hunted almost to extinction. They survived those dark days and emerged calculating and determined to endure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all creatures you control, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards. Put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be like the sea: flow around that which is unmovable; for everything else, crash into it unrelentingly."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mind: a great weapon and an even greater weakness." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As insubstantial as fear, and as dangerous.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose new targets for target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your strategy is marvelous. I've just made a few minor adjustments." - Veris, watcher of Indi Keep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language - all before even reading the scroll!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious." - Garild, merfolk mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Optimists see the world as they wish it to be. Pessimists see the world as it is. Must these roles be mutually exclusive?" - Evo Ragus

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're trespassing in my reality. Ask permission next time." - Simun the Quiet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid." - Lumi, goatherd

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is how wars are won - not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed." - Yurin, royal assassin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Crimson Throne may be empty, but its coffers are full.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The underclass often forget that they are not tenants, or servants, but property."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies are the perfect marshland fighters - they don't need to breathe and they don't care what they step in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1. Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vampire enacts vengeance on the entire world, claiming her debt two tiny pinpricks at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the fens sleeps lightly, and always awakens hungry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness." - Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are few ways to escape the deathmark: bargaining with a demon, washing in the fabled waters of youth, and of course, death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay 6 life and sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The locks on the cages of the damned are opened with keys of marrow, sinew, and blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The armies of the dead always report well rested.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This might hurt less if you don't fight so hard. But I doubt it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every thought is a good one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, the nantuko study nature by revering it. In death, they study nature by disemboweling it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature." When enchanted creature dies, its controller chooses target creature one of their opponents controls. Return Necrotic Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My dreams darkened and seeped into my waking hours. Spellcraft and nightmare merged to create this monstrosity." - Sunniva, witch of Holm Hollow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is one hour of the night even we do not watch." - Sedva, captain of the watch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control. When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rotting Legion enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can take the fight out of nearly any creature if you know where its soft spot is." - Guttor, flesh-warper

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart." - Codex of the Constellari

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a dragon attacks, there are no bystanders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Arc Runner.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storms of the wastelands form quickly and hit hard. Few have anything to do with rain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A single drop of blood draws their attention, then they strip your bones clean before you have time to die." - Jamias, hermit of Telfer Peak

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side." "Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?" "Yes." "So shouldn't we - " "No."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. −8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long." - Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've lit most everything on fire - trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Cyclops Gladiator attacks, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature defending player controls. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to Cyclops Gladiator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices five lands. Destructive Force deals 5 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The end of the world rarely comes quietly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I bring the flame" and "I am the flame."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability." - Maggath, Sardian elementalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Elemental fire shimmers with rose hues and, unlike terrestrial blazes, smolders long after it's extinguished." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are goblinkind, heirs to the mountain empires of chieftains past. Rest is death to us, and arson is our call to war."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins." - Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle. When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The veneer of rationality peeled from the mage, revealing the spite and rage beneath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the heart of the mountain into the heart of the mage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Punishment is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Players can't gain life. Damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Magma Phoenix dies, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. {3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Multiverse is filled with limitless power just waiting for someone to reach out and seize it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?" - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options." - Maxti, pyromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His blood boiled over, and he erupted with fists of stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He will carve out a legend for himself with his own two hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player reveals a card at random from their hand. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rustling of leaves and a passing shadow are a dryad's only trace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same." - Ralph Waldo Emerson, Essays

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." - Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The war lasted for generations. The boars didn't need to hunt for food anymore. They fed on the fallen corpses, and the living fed off of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has forestwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She grants knowledge of the ways to traverse the forest's invisible connections.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wears the talismans of every creature she can evoke.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." - Lord Hilneth

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Haste Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was only then - to his infinite sorrow - that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any number of target players each gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who kill a jawspur rhino must prepare spells to lift the carcass - even a dozen hunters can't lift its bulk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of Vitality is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creatures you control get +0/+1. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mitotic Slime dies, create two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature does not need adornment." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snail shell, fern, tornado - the world connects all things in form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Primal Cocoon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protean Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Protean Hydra, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from Protean Hydra, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature has grown tired of the impositions of men and will begin to outfit its creations with tools for bloody instruction." - Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string." - Aref the Hunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life." - Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anywhere else, colossal. In the forests of Yavimaya, commonplace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In my early experiments in phylactery, I found that fragile forms have their uses." - Rocati, Duke of Martyne

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." - Baron Sengir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to." - Bonovar, siege commander

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please, honored friend, take it with my compliments. I insist."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact." - Sargis Haz, artificer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul in his work. But the newly awakened golem decided he wanted his creator's other, more tangible parts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enlightenment is not gained by striking the bell or hearing its toll. It's found in the silence that follows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do bad things always come in threes?" - Gisulf, expedition survivor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The missing piece to every puzzle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To split wood with it would be sacrilege. This tool has but one purpose, and that is war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The great wurm bit down on me. Instead of being crunched bloody, I slid into the space where its tooth was missing. One tooth - a boon most potent, indeed." - The Tall Tales of Oleander

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Exile target attacking creature an opponent controls. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
